text: information on property tax bill amend rsa i to read as follows the tax bill which is sent to every person taxed as provided in rsa shall show the rate for municipal local education state education the total amount of funds distributed from the education trust fund pursuant to rsa in the previous fiscal year the amount of funding the respective municipality shall no longer receive under rsa as a result of the reduction in adequate education grants pursuant to rsa and county taxes separately the assessed valuation of all lands and buildings for which said person is being taxed and the right to apply in writing to the selectmen or assessors for an abatement of the tax assessed as provided under rsa the department of revenue administration shall compute for each town and city the rates which are to appear on the tax bills and shall furnish the required information to the appropriate town or city
